Bombay Sapphire4oz. premium tonic water2fresh bay leaves, for garnish1mandarin wedge½oz. fresh mandarin juice½oz. sherryIcePreparationStep 1Pour the mandarin juice, sherry, and Bombay Sapphire into the glass.Step 2Fill the glass with ice. Give it a quick stir, and top off with tonic water.Step 3Garnish with mandarin wedge. Twist the bay leaves to release aromas, then place as a garnish in the drink next to the mandarin.Click to Shop Bombay Sapphire NowBE BRILLIANT AND INSPIRED. DRINK RESPONSIBLY!©2020.
